name: Boneless Lechon
procedure: 1. Make the brine by combining lemongrass, onions, laurel leaves,peppercorns, garlic, sugar, salt and water.
2. Bring to a boil over medium/high heat,until the aromatics are infused into the water. Let it cool completely
3. Transfer the brine mixture into a large casserole that can fit in the pork. Be sure that the pork is completely submerged in the brine. Leave in the fridge overnight or at least 6 hours
4. Remove pork from the casserole and wash under running water. Pat dry
5. Lay the pork flat and layer with stalks of lemongrass, green onions, laurel leaves and black peppercorns
6.Roll the pork and secure with a kitchen twine. Cover with aluminum foil
7.Pop into preheated oven at 180°C for 2 hrs
8. Remove aluminum foil. Be careful because the juice from the pork get accumulated at the bottom of the aluminum foil is very hot
9.Put the pork back into the oven and roast for another 3hrs at 200°C

name: Humba Bisaya
procedure: 1. Combine pork belly, garlic, soy sauce and vinegar in wok
2. Bring to a boil over medium/high heat, stirring occasionally until fat has rendered and meat is tender.
3. Transfer meat to a large pot. Add dark soya sauce, sugar, bay leaves and water
4. Bring to a boil until and simmer until meat is tender and liquid is reduced to 1/3
5. Add black beans and simmer until liquid is reduced and thickened

name: Beef Salpicao
procedure: 1. Marinate beef in salt, pepper, garlic and olive oil for 30 minutes in a bowl.
2. n a large pan, heat cooking oil over very high heat. Toss in beef with marinade ingredients. Keep on tossing very swiftly in very high heat.
3. eason with worcestershire sauce, soy sauce salt and pepper. Continue tossing until the sauce is well absorbed in the beef.
Finish with butter and toss the beef as it melts.Turn of heat. Serve with lots of toasted garlic on top.

name: Prawns and Mushrooms with Scrambled Eggs
procedure: 1. Cut off the bottoms of the seafood mushrooms, beach mushrooms and white mushrooms. Separate them individually and then clean them.
2. Heat cooking oil over medium heat and make scrambled egg first.
3. Heat cooking oil over medium heat, then stir fry mushrooms for 1-2 mins. Then add salt, balck pepper, shrimp, cooking wine, chicken broth, soy sacue, sugar, and oyster sauce. Mix them well.
4. Then, add water and corn starch. Let it stew.
5. Put the scrambled egg on the rice.
6. Pour the cooked mushroom from Step 3 on top
7. Garnish with green onions
